name: HAND-TRACKING INTERACTION DEMONSTRATOR for Oculus Quest (VR)
name_original: HAND-TRACKING INTERACTION DEMONSTRATOR for Oculus Quest (VR)
description:
We created a diverse interaction demo focused on hand tracking. Test out the demo and experience the 7 different experiences to enhance your immersive  journey.

Interactions & Hand-Tracking

  • Virtual UI Interactions 
  • One & two finger interactions.
  • One & two hand interactions
  • Specific interactions

Objects:

  • Basics 
  • Archery 
  • Sandbox
  • Ballista
  • Radio
  • Combat Stick

Levels :

  • Breakfast (Freshly squeezed OJ)
  • Remote Car (Mini Car Race Track)
  • General Hub 

Interhaptics is a development suite created for all XR and mobile applications. The suite includes two dev applications, The Haptic Composer and the Interaction Builder. with these two applications, users will have all necessary tools to create, design and build an immersive, interactive XR project, with little time and effort and no limitation on platform deployment.
